ygData.msgSnippet: why do you say that?, I found the brewing I did pretty profitable,  but I had to give my eyes, and wrist a break after a solid half hour. ... From: Sean
ygData.messageBody:
why do you say that?, I found the brewing I did pretty profitable, but I
had to give my eyes, and wrist a break after a solid half hour.
----- Original Message -----
From: Sean Kennedy <orang@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>

Subject: Re: [eqbards] Purity belt...SPOILER REQUEST



Not any more.

Subject: Re: [eqbards] Purity belt...SPOILER REQUEST


-----Original Message-----
From: Michal Hobson <given@...>
To: EQBards <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Wednesday, July 14, 1999 8:51 AM
Subject: [eqbards] Purity belt...SPOILER REQUEST


So scratch the gripe unless it is an extreme case. I guess I'm just
bent because my bank account hovers between 5 and 20pp constantly so there's
no way I could buy plate or any other really cool items yet.
Try "brewing". It's boring but you make really good money!

Brangwen
Little Bard of Kelathin
